key.name: search-engine
key.description: The search engine used when entering search terms in the URL bar.

key.name: homepage
key.description: The URL to load when opening a new window or clicking the home button.

key.name: new-tab-url
key.description: The URL to load when opening a new tab.

key.name: sidebar-width
key.description: Width of the vertical tabs sidebar in pixels.

key.name: restore-session
key.description: Whether to restore tabs from the previous session when starting the browser.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the window should start maximized.

key.name: search-suggestions-enabled
key.description: Show search suggestions from DuckDuckGo while typing in the URL bar.

key.name: custom-search-url
key.description: URL template for custom search engine. Use {} as the query placeholder.
